name: Duck Attack
description:
CONTROLS:

Click to drop bread and point ducks where to attack

WASD or ARROWS for movement

Use your power to control ducks and defeat the 4 golems.

Game made in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare #32

View in the Ludum Dare site: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/?action=preview&uid=11246
